Mappability pipeline¶

Pipeline to count mappable bases in a given genome

pipeline_mappability.calculateMappability(infile, outfile)¶

Calculate mappability using GEM

pipeline_mappability.countMappableBases(infile, outfile)¶

Count mappable bases in genome

pipeline_mappability.loadMappableBases(infile, outfile)¶

load count of mappable bases in genome

pipeline_mappability.splitMappabiliyFileByContig(infile, outfile)¶

Count mappable bases in genome

pipeline_mappability.countMappableBasesPerContig(infiles, outfile)¶

Count mappable bases for each contig

pipeline_mappability.loadMappableBasesPerContig(infile, outfile)¶

load count of mappable bases per contig

pipeline_mappability.full()¶

Count mappable bases in genome
